The **Aspose.Cells.Rendering.PdfSecurity** namespace provides classes security options of Rendering pdf.

## Classes

| Class | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [PdfSecurityOptions](./pdfsecurityoptions) | Settings of pdf when converting excel to pdf, PDF/A does not allow security setting. |
